abstract: At its annual meeting on Friday, shareholders will vote on a proposal asking Wal-Mart to require vendors to publish annual reports on working conditions in their factories.
snippet: At its annual meeting on Friday, shareholders will vote on a proposal asking Wal-Mart to require vendors to publish annual reports on working conditions in their factories.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart is facing new pressure to monitor and disclose how its international suppliers treat their workers.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Is Being Pressed to Disclose How Global Suppliers Treat Workers
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Is Being Pressed to Disclose How Global Suppliers Treat Workers

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
